snippet.textDisplay:
@beowolfradiaoul People like you make life difficult for me, because you've turned knowledge into a feast for your petty ego.

Our ideas are ageless; limitless; shapeless; indestructible. The thing is, your ideas are neither, for your ideas are naught. You are a magician of our world that fools people with your manipulative illusions.

I am the true master of reality's game of chess. You are nothing but a magician who is in denial of their own trickery.

Stop distorting life.

@beowolfradiaoul Apparently, we are all [equal]. As you can see, all of us are providing each other naught. You are too ignorant to provide less ignorance, and only feed off of other ignorant people, while you call me ignorant through your own ignorance to deny what is irrefutably present.

Do not try to provoke me with your empty words, because your provocations do not cease my wisdom. What you see as [naught] is only because your entire ability to reason is [naught].

snippet.textDisplay: I LOVE the soundtracks! I know Chaos Legion was the "guinea pig" game for the studio guys to actually get familiar first and then up came with Onimusha with all their actors' faces gimmick and all that. But I prefer Chaos Legion and I know Onimusha's quality etc. is better but Chaos Legion was just pure cool noir awesome with lack of development by the team. It's like Prototype in a way. Very interesting concept & you feel cool; but just not quite there yet. So if 2's coming out, I'm BUYIN' IT!
snippet.textOriginal: I LOVE the soundtracks! I know Chaos Legion was the "guinea pig" game for the studio guys to actually get familiar first and then up came with Onimusha with all their actors' faces gimmick and all that. But I prefer Chaos Legion and I know Onimusha's quality etc. is better but Chaos Legion was just pure cool noir awesome with lack of development by the team. It's like Prototype in a way. Very interesting concept & you feel cool; but just not quite there yet. So if 2's coming out, I'm BUYIN' IT!

snippet.textDisplay: I love the music, it's so reminiscent of DMC. Kind of sad that they didn't (or haven't yet) made a sequel to this game; the least Capcom could have done if this wasn't an option, was take the mechanics and applied it to Nero in DMC4. He could very well play like Sieg, IMO, summoning defeated bosses to fight with him. Lord knows the lack of weapons didn't help in his missions.
snippet.textOriginal: I love the music, it's so reminiscent of DMC. Kind of sad that they didn't (or haven't yet) made a sequel to this game; the least Capcom could have done if this wasn't an option, was take the mechanics and applied it to Nero in DMC4. He could very well play like Sieg, IMO, summoning defeated bosses to fight with him. Lord knows the lack of weapons didn't help in his missions.

snippet.textDisplay:
@Dlayer7 I think that's why they didn't bother giving Sieg other weapons his Legions did most of the work for him.

But what Capcom should do is remake it have the same combat system but make Sieg have more attacks & possibly more weapons would be good too.
Also more stages to the stages where pretty long but I wanted it to be longer because I enjoyed it. 

Sieg was awesome but just using the one weapon got abit annoying, but after awhile you get use to it in my opinion of course.
snippet.textOriginal:
@Dlayer7 I think that's why they didn't bother giving Sieg other weapons his Legions did most of the work for him.

But what Capcom should do is remake it have the same combat system but make Sieg have more attacks & possibly more weapons would be good too.
Also more stages to the stages where pretty long but I wanted it to be longer because I enjoyed it. 

Sieg was awesome but just using the one weapon got abit annoying, but after awhile you get use to it in my opinion of course.

snippet.textDisplay: yah wtf "omegachosenone" umm i dont know what the hell your playing but DMC1 is way better then choas legion, and the story line is better, music.... now theres a point to have an argument about, but then again look at the song "Flock Off" (omg such a good song), now dont get me wrong, choas legion and DMC are both good games (i own both) but.... they should never be put up next to one another, just isn't right, they are both different in a lot of ways, but when you come down to it, DMC WINS sry
snippet.textOriginal: yah wtf "omegachosenone" umm i dont know what the hell your playing but DMC1 is way better then choas legion, and the story line is better, music.... now theres a point to have an argument about, but then again look at the song "Flock Off" (omg such a good song), now dont get me wrong, choas legion and DMC are both good games (i own both) but.... they should never be put up next to one another, just isn't right, they are both different in a lot of ways, but when you come down to it, DMC WINS sry
